trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector in Logic Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: How to create and configure the BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: How to create and configure the BizTalk Trading Partner Management Connector or API app and use it in a logic app in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Get started with BizTalk Trading Partner Management and add it to your Logic App
trans-unit.target: Get started with BizTalk Trading Partner Management and add it to your Logic App

trans-unit.source: The BizTalk Trading Partner Management (TPM) service lets you define and persist business to business relationships such as partners and agreements along with associated artifacts such as schemas and certificates.
trans-unit.target: The BizTalk Trading Partner Management (TPM) service lets you define and persist business to business relationships such as partners and agreements along with associated artifacts such as schemas and certificates.

trans-unit.source: These relationships can then be enforced by related API services such as AS2, EDIFACT, and X12.
trans-unit.target: These relationships can then be enforced by related API services such as AS2, EDIFACT, and X12.

trans-unit.source: The TPM API App is the base requirement of the AS2 connector, the X12 API App, and the EDIFACT API App.
trans-unit.target: The TPM API App is the base requirement of the AS2 connector, the X12 API App, and the EDIFACT API App.

trans-unit.source: You can add BizTalk Trading Partner Management to your business workflow and process data as part of a business-to-business workflow within a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: You can add BizTalk Trading Partner Management to your business workflow and process data as part of a business-to-business workflow within a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Blank SQL Azure database - You have to create a blank SQL Azure database first, before creating a new TPM API App.
trans-unit.target: Blank SQL Azure database - You have to create a blank SQL Azure database first, before creating a new TPM API App.

trans-unit.source: To know more about trading partner agreement, click [here][1].
trans-unit.target: To know more about trading partner agreement, click [here][1].

trans-unit.source: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business workflow using a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Now that the connector is created, you can add it to a business workflow using a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: View the Swagger REST API reference at [Connectors and API Apps Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529766).
trans-unit.target: View the Swagger REST API reference at [Connectors and API Apps Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=529766).

trans-unit.source: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.
trans-unit.target: You can also review performance statistics and control security to the connector.

trans-unit.source: See [Manage and Monitor your built-in API Apps and Connectors](app-service-logic-monitor-your-connectors.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Manage and Monitor your built-in API Apps and Connectors](app-service-logic-monitor-your-connectors.md).
